data.name: Devilian: Tempest Class Pack
data.detailed_description:
Prepare for the coming storm! This pack contains everything needed to jump into the war for Nala as a Tempest.

Access to the Tempest Class

Devastate your enemies as the terrifying Tempest

Additional Character Slot

Unlock an extra character slot using this ticket

3-day Elara's Blessing

Earn 25% more XP and Devil Souls

Shining Expansion Rune

Gain 32 additional Warehouse slots

2 Inventory Expansion Tickets

Gain 16 additional Inventory slots

data.short_description: Prepare for the coming storm! This pack contains everything needed to jump into the war for Nala as a Tempest.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
